name: Generic IDs from string
description: Match generic 'ID type' substrings.Designed for matching order numbers from email subjects.Relies on preceding text like "Order #" to be so casual in it's matches.Example match text (flags: gim)--Order 123Order#123Order:123order(123)order(#123)order-123Order123Order#123Order # 123Order #123Order: 123Order : 123Order :123Order 123:Order (123)Order: (#123)order number 123order number #123Order Number: 123Order number is: 123Order ID is #123.Order Has Been Updated (#123)Order REF# 123order ABC-123-123Order (AB1-123-123)Order #: AB1-123-123order number #AB1-123-123Order Number: AB1-123-123Order Number: AB1-123-123-123-123-123-4567890957456-123574755-5-76-4-673675466-3-656-4455Order Number: AB1-123-123-123-123-123-4567890957456-123574755-5-76-4-673675466-3-656-4455-ABOrder Number: AB1-123-123-123-123-123-4567890957456-123574755-5-76-4-673675466-3-656-4455ABCDOrder Number: AB1-123-123-123-123-123-4567890957456-123574755-5-76-4-673675466-3-656-4455ABCD-123-ABC-123-ABC12Order Confirmation AB1-123-123Order Confirmation (#AB1-123-123)Order Acknowledgement - Internet Reference Number: AU123-123-123Service ID 123: Order PlacedREF# 123REF 123Tracking Number: 1A2B3C456789012345Label Number: AB12 3456 789C D
author: r
